Senior Data Engineer - Full-Time

ABOUT THE ROLE
We are seeking a Senior Data Engineer to join our Data Platform team. You will be responsible for designing, building, and maintaining scalable data pipelines that process petabytes of data daily.

CORE RESPONSIBILITIES
• Design and develop ETL pipelines using Apache Spark
• Maintain and optimize SQL databases
• Implement real-time data processing solutions
• Collaborate with data scientists and analytics teams
• Ensure data quality and pipeline reliability
• Mentor junior engineers

REQUIRED QUALIFICATIONS & MUST-HAVES
• Minimum 5 years of experience as a Data Engineer
• Expertise in Apache Spark and distributed computing
• Strong SQL and database design skills
• Experience with Python for data pipeline development
• Familiarity with cloud platforms (AWS or GCP)
• Experience with workflow orchestration tools (Airflow, Oozie)
• Strong communication and teamwork skills
• Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field

PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS & NICE-TO-HAVES
• Experience with Kafka for streaming data
• Knowledge of Informatica or Talend
• AWS certification (Solutions Architect or Data Analytics)
• Experience with containerization (Docker, Kubernetes)
• Familiarity with Terraform for infrastructure-as-code
• Machine learning pipeline experience

NICE TO HAVE
• Scala programming experience
• Experience with MongoDB or NoSQL databases
• Contributions to open-source projects
